0:
mkdir -p ~/.ssh
chmod 700 ~/.ssh 
cp /config/* ~/.ssh/
echo $'\n' >> ~/.ssh/id_*
restic unlock
restic backup /data
restic forget --keep-last 1 --group-by "" --prune

mkdir -p ~/.ssh
chmod 700 ~/.ssh 
cp /config/* ~/.ssh/
echo $'\n' >> ~/.ssh/id_* 
restic init || true
